website_summaries.verdict: Self-adhesive nipple concealers that are waterproof and reusable.
pros: Made from medical-grade, hypo-allergenic silicone,to accommodate sensitive skin
Self-adhesive and reusable if washed with warm water and mild soap after each use
Reasonably priced, with a 30-day return policy
cons: Complaints by about 10% of buyers included that the pasties showed up through clothes too easily and didn't stick well, especially around edges

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear with a bridesmaid dress. I had difficulty figuring out what kind of bra to wear underneath and decided to order these after someone suggested them. They stayed on the whole night and didn't move an inch. It was 100 degrees outside and they stayed put. I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Stick well and I like the storage pouch for them. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Emma Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These worked like a charm! They’re so comfortable and so much more practical than trying to wear a strapless bra. I LOVE the little carrying case they came with. The little sticky not only covered the nipple but provided a little lift as well (which is nice because I breastfed for about 11 months).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D

customer_reviews.title: Work great, love the case
customer_reviews.text: Work great, love the case! It helps when I wear bralettes not to have to worry about getting too much of the wrong attention. Part of me hates that as a woman I need to be worried about nipples being seen under a shirt if I want to not wear the thickest padded bra, part of me is relieved there's an easy product to hide the fact that I am a human with nipples. No hate on the product though. They stick right on and having the case is nice. I wouldn't advise wearing them too terrible long since they are silicone and not breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Mememe

customer_reviews.title: YESSS!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. I've had mine for months now and have still only used one pair over and over and over countless times and they are STILL sticky. They blend in well and dont come off, until you peel them off. They dont hurt when you peel them off either (if you're curious) Would recommend to everyone to have a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: You see it
customer_reviews.text: Theyre ok, was hoping they wouldnt make me look like i have bigger nipples but they do, just without the little nip peeping out.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Yang

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! These do the trick and are so lightweight and comfortable you will forget you are wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: My cat ate them, but they worked prior
customer_reviews.text: These got the job done and kept their stick for around 9-10 wears each. They're a little small, so you definitely see a weird lump under thinner tops/dresses--and they don't provide the pull-up support that larger sized nipple pasties give. My cat got ahold of them and mistook them for some bite sized chicken cutlets. RIP pasties.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I used them for tanning purposes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I used them for tanning purposes. The stick in place and are reusable. I place them right over nipple area while I tan in tanning booth. They stay put, and go back into its case. They can be trimmed too size. Great quality and prime shipping was quick!
customer_reviews.author: pro shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a pair of round shaped covers & a pair of flower shaped covers. The little case is convenient as well. The stickiness is there. It looked okay over my nips, you could kind of tell I was wearing them because it was all rounded out. But I still like them & to wear under tshirts when I don’t want to wear a bra, which is why I bought them, they’ll do the job. I would recommend to other people. Great for the price & they aren’t flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke G.

customer_reviews.title: These are awful
customer_reviews.text: These are awful. They look like you have giant puffy nipples under clothes and show a line. Also terribly sticky, like peeling off a bandaid. Bad product, I immediately threw it in the trash. Nippies are the way to go, I tried these in an attempt to cheap out. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Massive areolas
customer_reviews.text: I've tried these on under three different shirts and a dress and I'd rather go au natural than wear these. They show through the fabric (polyester, linen and a cotton blend) and make the protrusion under my shirt look more exaggerated. Rather than preserving some semblance of modesty, it highlights the area you are trying to cover in a non flattering way. I'm not talking about wearing thin, clingy clothing either. Loose, flowy tank tops, a linen shirt with the thickness of canvas, boom front and center. If I'm going to show off, I'm at least going to do it with what I have and not give the impression that I'm rocking saucers under my sundress.
customer_reviews.author: V.T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect item to have. Does the job and I love the fact that they provided a zipper bag that you can put them in. Happy Camper :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covers up well!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for a wedding, I had a thin dress and it help up pretty well. Almost had it on for 24 hours and it stayed on. Love the shapes and very cute.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are comfortable and stay in place, i like that they are washable and re-usable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the way they look
customer_reviews.text: I bought these & Nippies Skin at the same time. Don’t like the way these look but Nippies Skin are GREAT! They look great & easy to wear & come in diff sizes & shades.
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: They do the job, would like better plastic covers to store them
customer_reviews.text: I wore them for one day and they stay on well. The outline can show through on thin t-shirts a little. I would like a thicker and wider plastic to put back on them for storage purposes. The included thin plastic is just big enough and so I didn’t get the whole thing covered for storage and now there’s some fuzzies on the edges. Also would like the center area that covers the nipple to be a little larger for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: WithLove

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit different than what I expected and from the others I’ve used in the past. These stick great and I love the center part that doesn’t have the sticky stuff for the “sensitive part” however they are a bit raised and you can kind of see that through a thin shirt which kind of makes it look as though you are still showing some of your parts if you will! Also the case that they come in is weird as if you try and place them back in it, you’re likely to zip the product as the case is very tight. I’m keeping as I need but not sure that I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Ironsmom

customer_reviews.title: No more pokey nipples!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these little pasties!! I had no idea there was something like this available. I normally go braless all the time but it's some tops I won't wear because my nipples stay erect all the time. I had them on with this shirt & they were super comfortable. I've worn them twice now & I always wear lotion & body oil. Hopefully they stick for a long time. I can't wait to wear them this Spring & Summer with my light clothing & dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I think they are a good product. They stick well. However, for me, they made my nipple area look weird. My sister noticed and said it's better if my nipples show through my t shirts than if I wear these. It just made my breasts look "weird". I hate bras and never wear one... but I don't like the attention I get with nipples poking through t shirts. Unfortunately, these just weren't flush. You could tell the shape of them through the clothing. That's just me and my results. There are plenty of people that they have worked for.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Held up well with moderate activity and sweat
customer_reviews.text: Great for deep plunge shirts! I did put these things through the ringer, just to see how they would hold up. I took both of my 70lb+ dogs on fast paced walks(1hr each) I pulled weeds in the garden Ran in the back yard with the dogs Sweat a fair amount. After so much activity, one side of the pastie lost its adhesive quality but, it was still sticking for the most part. They never once shifted. I would recommend this product and will continue to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Stitch

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased similar silicone pasties before, however, I LOVE THESE! I live in a VERY humid area of the country, and I can wear these without fear of them falling off! They also come with a case for easy storage (others did not) they became a gross sticky mess trying to keep the plastic they are stick to! Not These silicone pasties! Everything stays in the zipper pouch. Definitely will continue to purchase as I’m not a fan of wearing bras due to bras block the lymphatic system from draining properly.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Thickness + longevity disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I chose these over the Pinky Petals I usually buy because they came in a pack of 2 and a carrying case. Unfortunately, I think I will be switching back. The material on these is not only substantially thinner (such that cold rooms still feel quite risky), the fact that the nipple portion has no adhesive makes them feel generally more precarious. I originally thought this was a good design feature, but in retrospect I'm realizing it means these will simply lose their stickiness sooner. Finally, quite disappointed that the carrying case is such a tight squeeze. Seems like it would have been simple to make it just a centimeter wider in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Themyscira4ever

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: These places are really nice and I like how they have a soft part for your nipples it's like a little felt patch right where your nipple is that way when you peel it off you're not like yanking your nipple off with it. They're easy to wash I've used them multiple times and they were great especially when you have a dress that you don't have a bra with or a strapless bra won't work with these work great and definitely would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: P. Velez

customer_reviews.title: No longer a discreet carrying case . . .
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as expected, and I like the minimal packaging they've seemed to have adopted after some of these reviews. However, I really wish I had known the case design had changed since the original listing. It now comes in a half aluminum zipper case with pink lining and their logo with "Breast Petals" on one side. Okay, the logo turned out to be a sticker, but I'm not really a pink type of gal. I would have much preferred the black case shown in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa K

customer_reviews.title: Greatest invention ever made for females
customer_reviews.text: Three cheers to this inventor which I’m guessing was female, hated bras like I do, loved the creation of nontoxic silicone like I do, and thought ‘Hmm, I love halter style tops and despise strapless bras and my nipple high beams are always on even in the Mojave Desert!’ Wash them gently after each use. Shake water off and let air dry. I’ve been wearing these nearly everyday for weeks and they stick like magic. No adhesive at ‘breathable’ nipple end so you don’t rip yours off, lol. Little carry case :-) Be sure to keep the cellophane to put back on them so they don’t stick together in the case.
customer_reviews.author: 3CatsKindOfGal

customer_reviews.title: Just not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The sticky part came off quickly, there was excess around the pastie which was annoying, and it was very obvious, even thru thicker clothing because it's too thick. I would recommend to find a different brand. On recommendation, I tried nippies and found they work as I hoped these would work. They do not show under tight clothing and they last. These are one of the items where u pay for what u get.
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: They dont stick!
customer_reviews.text: They don't stick to me at all! I've only bought pasties once before at a similar price point from CVS.. They were amazing and I decided I was going to get another pair. Unfortunately, I can always feel one of them peel off throughout the day. I've developed a habit of feeling if they're there and I probably look like a weirdo. I found it on the floor on multiple occasions. I've tried both pairs and it's happened more than once for each one! (lol) hilarious, but unfortunate. wouldn't recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye bra!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I hate wearing bras, now I'm at the point where bras are so uncomfortable that I refuse to wear them. However I didn't like my nipples "poking" through my shirt. If I notice is then other people will too. I had other nipple covers but the stick didn't last long. I found these, and when they arrived, I tried them on right away. Just what I needed! I wear them at work, so I won't have to keep a sweater on (it's getting too warm). My nipples dont show through my shirt!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 99% of outfits!
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first time using pasties. I’ve used these daily for over a month and they’ve held up great until losing a little stickiness over the past week (but for 2 for $9 it’s totally worth it!). They cover everything and stay in place all day. Only thing is that with really thin clothing you can sometimes see the outline of the pastie. Compared to a more expensive brand I purchased in store, I prefer these because they’re thinner and don’t make your boob look deformed under tight shirts. The case is perfect for travel too!
customer_reviews.author: kdw18

customer_reviews.title: Nipple Ring Safe
customer_reviews.text: Let’s dive right in shall we! I always want to go bra-less and my nipples are pierced BUT I’m always worried that i’ll snag them on something and die right where I stand. These little beauties work like a charm. They don’t move and my bod mods are safe. It does not hurt at all to remove them unlike pasties. I also love the little case they came in! I will be purchasing more and will be on the look out for more skin tone ranges as the provided flesh tone does not match that of my Nubian.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine-Piper Springfield

customer_reviews.title: Did the job sufficiently
customer_reviews.text: So I've never ordered pasties before and this is the first time I've ever used them. They do exactly what they are supposed to. I wish they were a little bit smaller because I'm small chested and these kind of came loose at the bottom when I went bra free. As long as the shirt I'm wearing is tight enough to hold my breasts in place it's not a big deal. They came off with no issues or pain and the little carrying case is nifty because I can just throw it in my bag and go.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer smith

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect, cheap
customer_reviews.text: So there is a fabric piece in the center of each pastie that is non-adhesive, presumably to protect a nipple. However on 2 of the 4 pasties I received this non-adhesive segment was way off center, far toward the edge of the pastie, so that there was not enough adhesive space for it to properly adhere. Also the material at the edge of the most severely off-kilter piece (pictured) is thinner than on the other four pieces. It’s super annoying to return a $7 item over what is obviously an manufacturing defect. I won’t be ordering another set because I don’t know what’s to stop this from happening again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Quite frankly underwhelming. The best thing I can say about these petals is that the adhesive is strong but not uncomfortable. They smell horribly of chemicals and not a well manufactured women’s product. Similar feel to the Victoria secret pasty bras and better hold, but questionable in terms of contents. One of the flower shaped petals had a lump in it. Like it was made as one of those tumor/lump demo products for cancer awareness. You can see the lump through clothing. Plain as day. Like an offset nipple. These do not hide you nipples well and actually make you look like you May have huge, whopping, raised nipples through your sheer clothing. Comfortable, but not truly breathable as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Eliser

customer_reviews.title: What a genius idea.
customer_reviews.text: These were absolutely awesome for my 12 1/2 year-old. She said they were comfortable, they are reusable as well, came in a darling little zipper case to be discreet and served the purpose perfect for her holiday dress. They stayed very secure but we haven’t used them multiple times yet but definitely worked perfect for the first use. Not sure how well the adhesive will hold up long-term but absolutely satisfied with my purchase either way. I sprayed a tiny bit of water on the back and put saran wrap on top for Storage till next use
customer_reviews.author: Tangled mess

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: You get two sets and I have been re-using the first set by replacing the plastic film after I remove them. I always had issues with my nipples still showing but these are really working for me. They are also super comfortable and I actually forget I have them on sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Salerno

customer_reviews.title: Covers and sticks very well!
customer_reviews.text: Stayed on great! Used this to try on wedding dresses and it was perfect. They are still plenty sticky and I’ll be able to reuse them multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: maddy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I don't have a huge chest and I HATE having to wear a bra just to cover my nips. Not to mention every outfit isn't fit for a bra. I'm able to put these on and just go. If you sweat they will start to pull away that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Shaquila

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I needed to wear them under a mesh bodysuit in Jamaica...they stood the heat and me dancing and never came off until I took them off maybe. I had them on for around 6 hours and they were very comfy and easy use .
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had good reviews, but it was a total waste of money. First they look horrible, they are super noticeable no matter what type of shirt you are wearing. Second, if you try to wear them in a hot day they will come of as soon as you walk out of your door. They say that they were waterproof and that they resist very hot temperatures, LIES! I live in San Diego and every single time I try to used them they will stick at first an 3 min later they will start coming off, even if it wasn't as hot outside, no even trying to use them on days were is 100°.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: They’re okay. The stickiness doesn’t last longer than a couple uses if you want a real good stick. Aslo, under a tee, it makes your boobs look like man boobs. Sorry for the bad review. It could just be on me. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: sandra rinck

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for 2 weeks then the edges started falling apart. I do not recommend going braless with them unless you have a shirt with thick material. They bring more attention to your nipples with a regular shirt. So unless that's what you're going for then stay away.
customer_reviews.author: LINDSEY

customer_reviews.title: I’m addicted to these. I seldom wear bras in ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m addicted to these. I seldom wear bras in the summer now!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend
customer_reviews.text: Pros: stick well. Cons: it makes you look like you have lumps instead of nipples. It doesn't blend in!! I can't wear these out in public. I'd rather wear nothing!
customer_reviews.author: A. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Giant mound under tank top
customer_reviews.text: These leave a giant mound outline where you place them. It looks like I got stung by a bee on my nipple and it swoll up all around it! Returning today.
customer_reviews.author: An's Review

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind for your tits
customer_reviews.text: IDK if my titties are just too triangular but when I wear these they make my boobs come to a rounded point at the end. That being said, they do stay on pretty well, unless it's a hot day and you're sweating a bunch, then they start to come loose at the edges. Nice to have for clothes where you want peace of mind in the event of a nip slip but could be a little thinner/ less visible through clothes; again, could be bc I have pointed boobs, who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Elle McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: Good product in a discreet pouch
customer_reviews.text: I like them. Two pairs is just the right quantity; they come with a pouch that protects them and does not give away what is inside. I appreciate that the area that covers the nipple is not adhesive, like the ones I had before; that detail makes removing them much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: E. P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Life Improved!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these on the daily for months now. The adhesive is just now starting to get a little questionable. But they do the job! Saves me the embarrassment of worrying about my nips sticking out for the world to see. No longer do I walk into a crowded area with my forearms in front of my chest. My boyfriend hates that I “hide them away” but when I get home I take them off and there is no pain with removal. They go on and peel off like butter. Thanks for making my life better!
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Bauerlein

customer_reviews.title: Pasties Served Their Purpose
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old daughter wore these with an outfit that she couldn't wear any of her bras with. She's only an A cup and the sole purpose was to make sure you couldn't see her nipples through the fabric. She didn't complain about wearing them so they must not have been uncomfortable. They were definitely a great option instead of trying to find a bra that didn't show while she was wearing this particular outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These had good reviews but I still had metered expectations as a lot of pasties are garbage. But these were great! So comfortable, provided good coverage (you know what I mean, no nip show -through), and came off easily. I also love the case they came in, really great for travel. I'm super happy I got these and my hunt for the perfect accessory to wear with my backless dresses is finally over.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Too large can see it through the dress or shirt
customer_reviews.text: Not good if wearing light fabric...can see the entire outline of the pasty...better to go without anything than have a large protruding pasty showing
customer_reviews.author: MCbuyer

customer_reviews.title: easy to wash and reuse
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried other nip coverings /stickers and i tend to be allergic or they normally rip skin off. Did not have any issues .also used under bathing suit just in case and they did not come off after hours of swimming . 100% would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lizette

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Made my boobs look like i had pepperoni nipples because they arent shaped right at all for the curvature of big boobs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not stick well
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in these pasties as they do not stick as well as other brands. The case is nice, so buy them for the case...keep the case and buy a different brand of pastie.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Willis

customer_reviews.title: Hate them
customer_reviews.text: They make you look like you have pancake nipples. Those large ones that stick out. When I get cold they stop sticking, part of the pop off. I thought it was a defective pair but I have tried 2 now. Odd color on everyone too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Work great unless you have a piercing
customer_reviews.text: They work great if you need them for regular stuff like going braless and don't have piercings in that area. The stickyness is great, flower shape is adorablely cute. Although for me cloth part to cover actual nipple is not very big if you have big pierced nipples. I bought these to protect my nipples after getting them pierced and wasn't able to use them as the sticky part ends up on barrels and doesn't feel very good pulling it off when u have piercings let alone freshly pierced ones. Gave 5 stars cause overall it works great and looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: BellyDancinBrei

customer_reviews.title: I am returning mine.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These start to peel up on the ends so if youre wearing a tight shirt its obvious youre wearing pasties. Would not recommend for multiple uses. If you only need them for one night, then you should be fine. I am returning mine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Like them however you can still see the circle through the shirts which brings attention to what I was trying to hide lol maybe if they make the inner or outer part darker it wouldn’t be so bad. You can also still see the nipple when I work out and where light colors.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Good adhesion, thick material, gets sweaty
customer_reviews.text: They stick all day, theyre thick material though so unless the clothing youre wearing is also thick or loosely fitting the outline WILL show through. Theyre pretty comfortable other than sweating underneath them, if its warm out be prepared for them to be wet with sweat by the time youre done wearing them for the day lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing and just perfect for somebody like me. First of all, I just hate wearing bras. I find bras especially unnecessary and inconvenient because I live in such a hot climate and I have a smaller chest. The adhesive on this has proved to be extremely sturdy. I wash the pasties after each use and it still stays pretty adhesive. Also, I love that it comes with a small case! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just amazing. It work perfectly .the paste held on and it didnt even move. Love the package + its reusable cant fo wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: MARISHA

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as comfortable or durable as Nippies, but a reasonable alternative if you’re looking to spend less or only wanting to use them a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place doesn't lose its adhesive  on repeated use.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it covers the area of the uvala all the way and are sticky and good to use over and over again they don't hurt to take on and off.. but what I didn't like is they are very thick.. and I feel like they stick out and makes it obvious like my nipples would.. but I like them!
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive does not last longer than two uses !
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. I am very disappointed in this product that should conceal my nipples but instead it disfigures my boobs , makes them look like nippleless but with big Bloch of something and still very noticeable through clothes. It outlines the pad .
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Z

customer_reviews.title: Greatness Pasties
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear under a shear top that is too awkward for a bra. They work great. Sticky. Same skin tone and perfect case for them. Unfortunately you can see the outline of them and made it look like I have very puffy nipples. I’m sure I will be able to use them with something. If buying for a loose/shear item I wouldn’t recommend. But they are a great product if you really need them. Just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ashly O.

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review.
customer_reviews.text: These work exactly as they should. They're a bit larger than different ones I've had in the past but that's not an issue at all. I'm flat chested so I dont like wearing bras. These help perfectly.!! They stick all day long. Never come off voluntarily. They came in a nice zip holder case as well with a mesh lining. Really incognito. Lol Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: BP90

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for wedding dress shopping so I only reused them once but they are very sticky and stayed in place. Did the job and were comfortable. Forgot they were there.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for weather protection. I moved from LA to Seattle. My nipples haven’t adjusted to the cold. They actually started to really hurt. I personally don’t care if people can see my nipples thru my shirt. But I was in pain- that’s when I care. These create a barrier that warmed them up and eased the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great covers that are invisible and stick well
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to apply and stick very well. They're easy to wash and reusable. I have worn with different materials and have had no problems with them showing through or coming off or loose while wearing. I'm comfortable which I am grateful for, I hate to be out and not able to enjoy myself because I'm worried about a wardrobe malfunction. The price was great and they score and A+ in my book. You won't be disappointed in these either!
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: These pasties are very thick. It can be a good thing if your dress/shirt is thick. But definitely not meant for silky/thin dresses/shirts, you’ll be able to see the outline of the pasties.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn a bra in almost a year, I love not having to put an extra article of clothing on in the morning and these are awesome for those sore boobie days! Definitely don't wear them for more than 12 hours, or the nips become slightly water logged. You have to rinse them and your nips with mild soap and wala they're like brand new!
customer_reviews.author: pooploop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, long lasting, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase and I love this product! I’ve purchase other brands that are much more expensive and do not work or last nearly as long. Great product, long lasting adhesive, good coverage, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product all the time, it lasts a long time (unless you use it everyday, but you shouldn't anyway because it can breakdown the skin around your nipples ---talking from experience). It sticks really well and moves with your body, i've try a couple different brands, shapes, etc and they usually create an obvious shape after putting a shirt on --- THIS PRODUCT DOESNT DO THAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Tam

customer_reviews.title: they seem to stick well, but their outlines are ...
customer_reviews.text: they seem to stick well, but their outlines are fairly visible through fabric. Also, I got 3 circle shapes and 1 flower shape so I have a mismtached pair lol
customer_reviews.author: Cheltsey Vann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nifty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for strapless dresses, when you prefer tops instead of bras, or even if you just want to wing it and skip the bra altogether. They're easy to use, easy to clean and come in their own nifty box for safekeeping. Give them a try if you wear lots of strapless dresses or tops and are annoyed when your nipples show through your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: LSD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I needed! Took these on a cruise where I would be wearing a lot of strappy dresses. These fit well over my nipple, weren't visible under the clothing, and weren't super painful to get off. I've used them multiple times and they haven't lost their stickiness! And I love that they come with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very discreet, i love the little carrier it comes with. It’s very nice that it is reuse-able and easy to clean. Just some warm water and soap will rejuvenate it. The only thing i dont like is having to keep the little plastic thing. I lose it easily. I guess you dont really have to, but i feel that if i let them stick together it may ruin the product faster. Wish there was some other way to cover the sticky side when not in use. But over very nice product
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I normally can't stand these because you can always see them through shirts, they're always too thick. These seem to be a lot less noticeable, though I still wouldn't wear them with a thin top. Overall, they stay on through sweaty summer days and are easy to wipe clean and reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo
customer_reviews.text: Photos and reviews stated many came with the black case but mine did not. mine came in a cardboard box only with no case. Seem to work well. Having trouble sticking after minimal use though.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel DeGennaro

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality but wish they were stickier
customer_reviews.text: They don’t stick super well but they’re solid for a while. I got these because I hate wearing bras but they fell off a couple of times. Going to have to try to find stickier ones Or maybe buy tape or body glue to stick them on better. They are also kinda visible through the shirt if it’s tight but I guess that is to be expected. Anyways they were ok but not perfect, wish they were a little more sticky!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Husak

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Update*** I was able to fix case, was just smashed, and they put one extra in, so I have 2 pairs with one extra, think by accident ? Thought I was getting 2 pairs with a pair of free paisties but I was wrong , just 2 pairs. Havent tried them yet so will see how they work !
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L Grant

customer_reviews.title: Covers Minimally
customer_reviews.text: The pasties provide minimal coverage, which is as advertised. This is not about the product, but about my comfort with it. The coverage was too little for my taste, although it was as described. .
customer_reviews.author: silvia elias

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: You can see the shape and color through white clothing. Tried with another top and you can see the shape. Waste of money. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: maria1011

customer_reviews.title: Great staying power
customer_reviews.text: I wear these during intense workouts because the ultra supportive bra I have shows my nipples very well (not intentional by any means). They stick during a 1 hour HIIT workout without any issues. I remove them slowly as some people said they pulled skin but I haven't found that to be true. I wear each shape (flower or circle)at least twice a week (4 workouts/week) and have had them for a couple weeks now and I have not noticed the stickiness coming off. I would highly suggest purchase. There is no lift to these - just plain ol nipples covers so don't expect lift.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I hate wearing bras and I usually wear a tank top underneath larger tops. The main issue I have is that I get cold a lot and my nipples can become prominent. This product is a life-saver. They're great for everyday wear and I don't even feel them. They're easy to take off and clean for re-use as well.
customer_reviews.author: britt mo

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: Overall: these work, great for dresses when you cant wear a bra Pros: sticks, reusable Cons: none Would I buy it again: yes Would I recommend: yes
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Davey

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and very adhesive
customer_reviews.text: These are life changing. I didn't realize how often I would be using these when I bough them. These are perfect for all outfits when you don't want to wear a bra- especially in the summer. I have replaced wearing a bra with these and I'm so happy! I'm still on my first set and it's been about 10 uses!
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product.
customer_reviews.text: These were really visible under my tight fitting tops. They created a large circle under my clothes making it obvious I was wearing nipple covers.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lump?
customer_reviews.text: One of the pads had a lump on it and when i put them on my nipple didnt show through my shirt but the lump did. I feel like that kinda defeats tge purpose of me buying these. The pads are amazing and cover well. Not as sticky as I thought they would be, you cant really pull them up if you want your boobs to not hang. But they're good enough if you need something fast.. They came in the afternoon the day after I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Phillip

customer_reviews.title: A summer essential
customer_reviews.text: Omg my daughter is obsessed with these. She is a teen and still has a small chest (a cup) but since buying these I don’t think she has worn a bra all summer! She wears lots of spaghetti strap tops and hates strapless bras. She wore them all day at six flags and it was crazy hot and they mostly stayed on. They pulled away from her skin a little (it was like 95 degrees and we were sweating buckets) but she could just push them back on and they were good to go!
customer_reviews.author: shopingmom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly and stayed on during an outdoor, August wedding in Texas! I was worried they would come off when I started sweating, but they stayed on for hours and worked so well!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive isn't strong to last all day.
customer_reviews.text: After a few hours of wear, they came off and fell and the floor. Adhesive isn't strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I've used before
customer_reviews.text: I like that they come in two different shapes-- circle and one with petal edges. The adhesive works well and once on, you forget they are there. I did notice some show-through when wearing a cotton sun dress. The little case is great for storing and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Nipped showed.
customer_reviews.text: Nipples poked through the pad so I don’t like this product and will not buy it again. Adhesive is very sticky though so that was good.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Weird
customer_reviews.text: These made my boobs look pointy and I will not be using them again. I thought they were such a great value for the money, but trying to wear them under any type of shirt is a horrible idea. I definitely do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: HBThevenin

customer_reviews.title: Not hypoallergenic for extremely sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this over my nipples and had a negative reaction. My skin is very sensitive and it did not take to the adhesive well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Consuela Bananahamic

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They work amazing! I have used them over and over and still are very sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: Show through
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a dress and they showed through :( too thick for the dress so I returned them. Would maybe work if the dress was built with thicker material.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love these, but couldn't
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these because I dislike wearing most bras. The styles are cute and convenient and ideally can be worn under anything... The reason I am giving them 2 stars is because I wore them each once but their outline over my nipples stood out so badly underneath all of my shirts that I would almost feel more comfortable letting my actually nipples show through without them! At least then the shape would look natural. I have not worn them again since that first time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective coverage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchase these before (without the change in material in the inner center part) and they used to provide great coverage . As you can see from the photo, now they cause not just a second look but maybe even a 3rd! Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Knv2004

product_meta.title: MUQU Womens Silicone Pasties, Breast Bra Reusable 2 Pairs Invisible Silicone Nipple Cover for Dress Pink
feature_bullets: 👩GREAT MATERIALS - These women invisible nipple covers are made from grade silicone. Doubling protection of sensitive parts of a woman.

👩REUSABLE - The women Silicone Pasties are Washable, Perfect under t-shirts, sheer tops, dresses, and swimwear. We have improved our working and product quality to avoid the non-stick and shedding of nipple cover.
👩COMFORTABLE & PORTABLE - The invisible silicone nipple covers are designed small enough to fit in a handbag. Unique matte design allows you to wear more peace of mind.
👩SUITABLE DIAMETER - The diameter (2.64 IN) of reusable nipple covers for a more secure coverage, you won't feel anything when wearing them.
👩PACKAGE INCLUDED - 2 Pairs invisible nipple cover pasties(1 Pairs Round + 1 Pair Flower) ❗Tips: new and old packaging randomly issued.
